item.title: 人工智能初创公司 Perplexity 获得新融资，估值达 180 亿美元
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，Perplexity AI 公司（该公司的人工智能搜索引擎可与谷歌竞争）已筹集到新的资金，这笔交易对这家初创公司的估值为 180 亿美元。【原文：Perplexity AI Inc., whose artificial intelligence-powered search engine competes with Google, has raised fresh capital in a deal that values the startup at $18 billion, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 铁矿石产量增加，必和必拓钾肥项目成本上升
item.description: 必和必拓集团有限公司（BHP Group Ltd.）在周五发布的季度报告中指出，其位于加拿大的主要钾肥项目成本上升且出现延误，而铁矿石和铜产量则有所增长。【原文：BHP Group Ltd. flagged rising costs and delays at its major potash project in Canada in its quarterly report Friday, which saw iron ore and copper production edge up.】

item.title: 沃勒称美联储应在劳动力市场岌岌可危的情况下立即降息
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）表示，决策者应在本月降息，以支持出现疲软迹象的劳动力市场。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said policymakers should cut interest rates this month to support a labor market that is showing signs of weakness.】

item.title: 美国数据提振情绪，亚洲股市将上涨：市场综述
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市将继续攀升，因为强劲的美国数据缓解了市场对经济的担忧，并支撑了美元，为全球股市的反弹注入了新的活力。【原文：Asian stocks were set to climb Friday as a global equity rally gained fresh vigor on strong US data that eased concerns about the economy and supported the dollar.】

item.title: 美国数据提振情绪，亚洲股市将上涨：市场综述
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市将继续攀升，因为强劲的美国数据缓解了市场对经济的担忧，并支撑了美元，为全球股市的反弹注入了新的活力。【原文：Asian stocks were set to climb Friday as a global equity rally gained fresh vigor on strong US data that eased concerns about the economy and supported the dollar.】

item.title: Invesco 旨在从 QQQ 中获利数亿美元
item.description: 这是蓬勃发展的被动投资领域的一个怪现象：在 11.7 万亿美元的 ETF 行业中，著名的科技基金 QQQ 是最赚钱的产品，但 Invesco Ltd. 在经营 QQQ 的过程中几乎一无所获。现在，这家资产管理公司正要求股东改变这种状况。【原文：It’s a quirk in the booming world of passive investing: Famed tech fund QQQ is the most profitable offering in the $11.7 trillion ETF industry, but Invesco Ltd. earns virtually nothing from running it. Now the asset manager is asking shareholders to change that.】

item.title: 日本上议院选举交易者指南
item.description: 由于民意调查显示首相石破茂领导的自民党可能会失败，投资者正准备应对周日上议院选举后日本债券、股票和日元可能出现的三重下跌。【原文：Investors are bracing for a potential triple dip in Japanese bonds, stocks and the yen after Sunday’s upper house election, as polls point to a defeat for Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s Liberal Democratic Party.】

item.title: 库什塔德公司竞标七枚奖章失败；我在日本引发争论
item.description: Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.决定放弃收购 Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.’s decision to walk away in frustration from an attempted acquisition of Seven & i Holdings Co. set off a debate in Tokyo as to what lessons foreign companies with ambitions for M&A should draw.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会撤销针对埃克森和雪佛龙董事会任命的命令
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会撤销了禁止先锋自然资源公司前首席执行官加入埃克森美孚公司董事会和禁止赫斯公司首席执行官加入雪佛龙公司董事会的命令。【原文：The US Federal Trade Commission set aside orders barring the former Pioneer Natural Resources Co. chief executive officer from joining Exxon Mobil Corp.’s board and the CEO of Hess Corp. from joining Chevron Corp.’s board.】

item.title: 沃尔玛股价创 2018 年以来最大跌幅
item.description: 沃尔玛墨西哥公司（Walmart de Mexico SAB de CV）公布的季度利润不及预期，股价周四大跌，创下自 2018 年 11 月以来的最严重跌幅。【原文：Walmart de Mexico SAB de CV shares plunged Thursday — their worst drop since November 2018 — after posting quarterly profit that missed estimates.】

item.title: 化肥生产商尤尼吉可获得贷款，可能被迫申请破产
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，陷入困境的巴西化肥生产商 Unigel Participacoes SA 已收到投资公司 ARC Capital 多达 1 亿美元的贷款提议，该公司由前瑞士信贷高管 Sergio Machado 创办。【原文：Struggling Brazilian fertilizer maker Unigel Participacoes SA has received an offer of a loan of as much as $100 million from investment firm ARC Capital, founded by ex-Credit Suisse executive Sergio Machado, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 米莱因放松货币管制再次获得穆迪评级提升
item.description: 穆迪评级公司今年第二次上调了阿根廷的信用评级，理由是阿根廷放松了货币管制，并得到了国际货币基金组织的支持。【原文：Argentina’s credit rating was upgraded by Moody’s Ratings for a second time this year, with the agency citing the easing of currency controls and support from the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 马拉松公司的理查兹说，私人信贷还有很大的发展空间
item.description: 马拉松资产管理公司（Marathon Asset Management）首席执行官布鲁斯-理查兹（Bruce Richards）表示，私人信贷基金尚未接近顶峰，未来十年私人资本领域的机会主义策略将继续增长。【原文：Private credit funds haven’t reached close to their peak and opportunistic strategies in the private capital sector will continue to grow in the next ten years, according to Marathon Asset Management Chief Executive Officer Bruce Richards.】

item.title: 如果自民党在大选中遭受重创，日本首相石破茂将面临艰难抉择
item.description: 如果日本首相石破茂领导的执政联盟在周日的上议院选举中无法保住多数席位，他的前景将十分黯淡。【原文：The outlook for Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba looks bleak should his ruling coalition fail to hold on to a majority in Sunday’s upper house election.】

item.title: 小特朗普和奥米德-马利克瞄准美国制造业的下一个 SPAC
item.description: 在周三首次推出枪支零售商 GrabAGun Digital Holdings Inc. 之后，1789 资本的合伙人小唐纳德-特朗普和该公司的创始人奥米德-马利克（Omeed Malik）正在寻找他们的下一笔大空头支票交易。【原文：After debuting firearm retailer GrabAGun Digital Holdings Inc. on Wednesday, Donald Trump Jr., a partner at 1789 Capital, and the firm’s founder Omeed Malik are looking for their next big blank-check deal.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州谷歌反垄断审判推迟，等待司法部相关案件的审理
item.description: 由德克萨斯州牵头的一个州团体声称，Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌公司非法垄断了在线显示广告发布工具市场，法官推迟了 8 月 11 日对谷歌公司的审判。【原文：A judge delayed an Aug. 11 trial against Alphabet Inc.’s Google over claims by a Texas-led group of states that the company illegally monopolized the market for tools to publish online display advertisements.】

item.title: 5 月外国国债持有量上升，加拿大增幅居首
item.description: 在加拿大购买量激增的带动下，5 月份外国投资者持有的国债数量攀升，这表明在担心特朗普政府政策影响的情况下，海外投资者对美国政府证券的需求依然强劲。【原文：Foreign investor holdings of Treasuries climbed in May, led by a surge in Canadian purchases, in a sign of resilient overseas demand for US government securities in the face of concerns over effects from Trump administration policies.】

item.title: 美国设定反倾销税后加拿大石墨公司业绩飙升
item.description: 在美国商务部对中国进口的关键电池材料征收 93.5% 的初步反倾销税后，加拿大石墨公司 Nouveau Monde Graphite Inc.【原文：Canadian graphite firms Nouveau Monde Graphite Inc. and Northern Graphite Corp. surged after the US Commerce Department imposed preliminary anti-dumping duties of 93.5% on Chinese imports of the key battery material.】

item.title: 卡尼准备增加支出，加拿大债务需求上升
item.description: 由于加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）承诺利用联邦资产负债表对经济进行投资，加拿大政府债务供应量将在本财年创下新高。【原文：The supply of Canada’s government debt is set to hit a record this fiscal year as Prime Minister Mark Carney pledges to use the federal balance sheet to make investments in the economy.】

item.title: RTX 在拖延多年后向太空部队交付 GPS 地面控制网络
item.description: 经过多年的拖延和巨额超支，美国太空部队已经接受了 RTX 公司价值 76 亿美元的地面控制网络，该网络将用于军方的 GPS 卫星群。【原文：The Space Force has accepted delivery of RTX Corp.’s $7.6-billion ground control network for the military’s constellation of GPS satellites following years of delay and massive cost overruns.】

item.title: 加拿大北部钻石矿停产，数百人被解雇
item.description: 勃艮第钻石矿业有限公司（Burgundy Diamond Mines Ltd.）在停止其位于加拿大北部的埃卡提（Ekati）的部分业务后，解雇了 "数百名 "工人，这给该国陷入困境的钻石开采业又增添了一记重击。【原文：Burgundy Diamond Mines Ltd. laid off “several hundred” workers after halting part of its Ekati operations in northern Canada, adding another blow to the country’s struggling diamond mining industry.】

item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 巴克莱银行认为医疗补助削减对 15 个州伤害最大
item.description: 据巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的预算法案可能会大幅削减美国最大的公共医疗保险计划，这对一些州造成的伤害会更大。【原文：President Donald Trump’s budget bill that could deeply cut the nation’s largest public health-insurance program stands to hurt some states more than others, according to Barclays Plc.】

item.title: 康卡斯特将孔雀价格提高近 38%，至每月 11 美元
item.description: 康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp. ）从 7 月 23 日起将其 Peacock 流媒体服务的新用户价格每月提高 3 美元，最低价格计划的价格提高了近 38%。【原文：Comcast Corp. raised the price of its Peacock streaming service by $3 a month for new customers starting July 23, an increase of almost 38% for the lowest-priced plan.】

item.title: T.罗尔-普莱斯公司在多年资金外流后裁减全公司员工
item.description: T.在这家总部位于巴尔的摩的资产管理公司努力应对资金外流和其他压力之际，罗威国际集团（T Rowe Price Group Inc.【原文：T. Rowe Price Group Inc. is making a business-wide round of job cuts as the Baltimore-based asset manager grapples with outflows and other pressures.】

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空公司考虑对面临更高利率的大流行病债务进行再融资
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空集团公司发言人说，该公司正在考虑对其在 2020 年和 2021 年大流行期间从美国政府获得的 6.89 亿美元贷款进行再融资，以帮助支付工人工资。【原文：Alaska Air Group Inc. is considering refinancing $689 million of loans it took out from the US government in 2020 and 2021 during the pandemic to help pay workers, a company spokesperson said.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利重启 40 亿美元 Finastra 债务再融资计划
item.description: 据熟悉该交易的人士透露，摩根士丹利正在重启为金融软件公司 Finastra Group Holdings Ltd. 提供约 40 亿美元私人贷款的再融资计划。【原文：Morgan Stanley is reviving an effort to refinance roughly $4 billion of private loans for financial software firm Finastra Group Holdings Ltd., according to people familiar with the transaction.】

item.title: 戴利称美联储不应等太久才开始降息
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）表示，她仍然认为决策者今年计划两次降息是合理的，并强调央行不应等待太久才采取行动。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said she still thinks it’s reasonable for policymakers to plan on two interest-rate cuts this year, emphasizing that the central bank should not wait too long before moving.】

item.title: 美国将对来自中国的关键电池材料征收 93.5% 的关税
item.description: 美国商务部对中国进口的石墨（一种关键的电池组件）征收了 93.5% 的初步反倾销税，原因是认定这些材料受到了不公平的补贴。【原文：The US Commerce Department imposed preliminary anti-dumping duties of 93.5% on Chinese imports of graphite, a key battery component, after concluding the materials had been unfairly subsidized.】
